name: Quite Soulless
storyline:
Why does it all fall on the Jonothan MacGoey?
Why are his sister and father dead?
Why is he followed by the outerspace monster?
Why does he meet again and again that bird, rat and strange indian?
Why has he a feeling, that there is some story... around this?
May be it is all because the whole city is going mad.
summary: Dive into the surreal world of J.MacGoey's adventure, where only aliens could help him to get out or even to understand where he is...
